articles.title: European Super League: Real Madrid, Barcelona and Juventus remain committed to 'modernising football' - Sky Sports
articles.description: Real Madrid, Barcelona and Juventus say they will not bow down to pressure in their attempts to launch a breakaway Super League.

articles.title: How vaccine passports for global travel will work - NBC News
articles.description: The European Union, some Asian governments and the airline industry are scrambling to develop so-called Covid-19 vaccine passports to help kickstart international travel.
articles.content:
Boarding pass, suitcase, passport and... digital vaccination certificate?

articles.title: Two traders share their top international bets as European stocks climb to records - CNBC

articles.title: Big Match Feature: Villarreal v Man United - SuperSport
articles.description: The 2020/21 UEFA Europa League final brings together Spanish competition stalwarts Villarreal, who have never previously lifted a major European trophy, and 2016/17 winners Manchester United.

articles.title: WHO member nations, including Australia, call for fresh probe into origin of COVID-19 - ABC News
articles.description: Australia joins the United States, Great Britain, Japan and the European Union in calling for more information about how COVID-19 began passing between humans.

articles.title: Man City and Chelsea - From outsiders to European elite - SuperSport
articles.description: Champions League finalists Manchester City and Chelsea were once the brash newcomers who upset the established European powers but they are now part of the continental elite.
